comments.body: In earlier versions NumPy used to [raise ValueError](https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/v1.2.0/numpy/lib/function_base.py#L2756), pandas [setup.py has defined min_numpy_version to 1.13.3](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/master/setup.py#L36). Since [NumPy 1.13.3, IndexError is being raised](https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/v1.13.3/numpy/lib/function_base.py#L4842)
@sathyz Thank you for looking into this!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +178,182 @@    msg = "index 6 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 6"
    with pytest.raises(IndexError, match=msg):
        idx.delete(len(idx))
